items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t persuade his classmates to change their minds about postponing the dance.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary was going, but he had a good idea where she might be going.
Tom had his ear pressed to the door, trying to hear what was going on in the next room.
Are you really going out on such a cold day? I think youâ€™d be better off not going out.
Tom could hardly believe his ears when he heard that Mary was coming back home to stay.
In the short time Tom was away from his desk, Mary scribbled something in his textbook.
When did you find out that Tom wasn\'t the one who Mary wanted to go to the dance with?
Tom looked disappointed when Mary told him that she wouldn\'t go to the dance with him.
It\'s best to translate from a foreign language you know into your own native language.
Mary closed her eyes and waited for Tom\'s kiss. When she opened her eyes Tom was gone.
